content:
ParameterMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the direction of a parameter.

In this Article

public enum ParameterMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ParameterMode

Fields

In

An input parameter.
InOut

Both an input and an output parameter.
Out

An output parameter.
ReturnValue

A return value of the method.
